clinical_study.brief_title: Gastroprotective Agent Utilization and Compliance in Elderly Patients Taking Non-steroidal Anti-inflammatory Drug (NSAID) in France
clinical_study.official_title: Gastroprotective Agent Utilization and Compliance in Elderly Patients Taking Non-steroidal Anti-inflammatory Drug (NSAID) in France

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to assess in general population NSAID and gastroprotective agent utilization and compliance in elderly people.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- French people > 65 years old, part of Kantar Health Access Sant√© panel
